description: A woman aged 73 with dementia is fined for having the wrong date on her lockdown exemption form.
title: Coronavirus France: Elderly woman fined for lockdown form error
title_page: Coronavirus France: Elderly woman fined for lockdown form error - BBC News
maintext: The mayor then advised the police to waive the fine, but they did not do so. A prosecutor had also pleaded for the fine to be waived, but the court in nearby Vesoul decided the fine must stay.
